name: RetroCat
description: RetroCat is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its vibrant orange box and classic arms and legs, it exudes a nostalgic charm. Its retro console buttons allow it to navigate through various digital interfaces while its cat-shaped screen adds a touch of whimsy. RetroCat's helmet addon enhances its capabilities and protects it during its adventures in the digital realm.
